title: Capture Base
description: Successfully capture any facility or outpost.

title: Defend Base
description: Prevent the enemy from capturing a facility you own.

title: Flash Rider
description: Eliminate an enemy on a Flash/Javelin.

title: Revive Teammate
description: Revive a Teammate using your medical applicator.

title: Necromancer
description: Revive 3 teammates using a single Revive Grenade.

title: Headshot Kill
description: Eliminate an enemy with a Headshot.

title: Melee Kill
description: Eliminate an enemy with a Knife.

title: Grenade Kill
description: Eliminate an enemy with a Grenade detonation.

title: Side-Arm Kill
description: Eliminate an enemy using a Side-Arm / Pistol.

title: Kill Through Smoke
description: Eliminate an enemy while visibility is obscured by smoke.

title: Trade
description: Trade kills with an enemy. (Die at the same time)

title: Kill Bounty
description: Eliminate an enemy marked with a bounty.

title: One Life
description: Win a fight with 50 hp remaining.
